name: Mazes of Karradash
description:
*** Mazes of Karradash 2 is now available! The first chapter is 50% off! ***


"Mazes Of Karradash is a great lightweight retro-ish dungeon crawler" - TouchArcade.com

The city of Karradash is under attack: the monsters of the Shadow Realms are emerging from the depths.
No adventurer is strong enough to defeat the horde alone, but the whole people of Karradash is ready to fight.

"Mazes of Karradash" is a dungeon crawl RPG. In this game you have to develop both the individual characters that the entire village.

Game features:

- 8 races to unlock improving your village.
- 8 classes, each with their own special skills and attributes to unlock improving your village.
- Perma-death: If your character dies is lost forever, but another, stronger adventurer from Karradash will be ready to replace it.
- 25 Dungeon levels.
- Improve the structures in the city to unlock new items, upgrade equipment, enhance future generations of adventurers and more.
- Dozens of weapons, armor and shields available: choose the best equipment for your style of fighting.
- No Pay-to-win, No in-app-purchase of gold, diamonds, better equipment or other stuff: complete the game with your own skills. Old school.
